name: Blackstone
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Blackstone can control Blackstone smart device via smart phone and voice commands device, such as switches, sockets, and fans, etc….
 Users are required to bind Blackstone Home to their Blackstone accounts when they use Blackstone Home at the first time. Meanwhile the Blackstone account must have been added at least one smart device.
 In order to obtain better control performance, please specify a clear name for each device in Blackstone APP like “my switch”, “my fan” etc….
